verses.verse: To the chief Musician<WH5329> upon<WH5921> Aijeleth<WH365> Shahar,<WH7837> A Psalm<WH4210> of David.<WH1732> My God,<WH410> my God,<WH410> why<WH4100> hast thou forsaken<WH5800> me? why art thou so far<WH7350> from helping<WH4480> <WH3444> me, and from the words<WH1697> of my roaring?<WH7581>
O my God,<WH430> I cry<WH7121> in the daytime,<WH3119> but thou hearest<WH6030> not;<WH3808> and in the night season,<WH3915> and am not<WH3808> silent.<WH1747>
But thou<WH859> art holy,<WH6918> O thou that inhabitest<WH3427> the praises<WH8416> of Israel.<WH3478>
Our fathers<WH1> trusted<WH982> in thee: they trusted,<WH982> and thou didst deliver<WH6403> them.
They cried<WH2199> unto<WH413> thee, and were delivered:<WH4422> they trusted<WH982> in thee, and were not<WH3808> confounded.<WH954>
But I<WH595> am a worm,<WH8438> and no<WH3808> man;<WH376> a reproach<WH2781> of men,<WH120> and despised<WH959> of the people.<WH5971>
All <WH3605> they that see<WH7200> me laugh<WH3932> me to scorn: they shoot out<WH6362> the lip,<WH8193> they shake<WH5128> the head,<WH7218> saying,
He trusted<WH1556> on<WH413> the LORD<WH3068> that he would deliver<WH6403> him: let him deliver<WH5337> him, seeing<WH3588> he delighted<WH2654> in him.
But <WH3588> thou<WH859> art he that took<WH1518> me out of the womb:<WH4480> <WH990> thou didst make me hope<WH982> when I was upon<WH5921> my mother's<WH517> breasts.<WH7699>
I was cast<WH7993> upon<WH5921> thee from the womb:<WH4480> <WH7358> thou<WH859> art my God<WH410> from my mother's<WH517> belly.<WH4480> <WH990>
Be not<WH408> far<WH7368> from<WH4480> me; for<WH3588> trouble<WH6869> is near;<WH7138> for<WH3588> there is none<WH369> to help.<WH5826>
Many <WH7227> bulls<WH6499> have compassed<WH5437> me: strong<WH47> bulls of Bashan<WH1316> have beset me round.<WH3803>
They gaped<WH6475> upon<WH5921> me with their mouths,<WH6310> as a ravening<WH2963> and a roaring<WH7580> lion.<WH738>

I am poured out<WH8210> like water,<WH4325> and all<WH3605> my bones<WH6106> are out of joint:<WH6504> my heart<WH3820> is<WH1961> like wax;<WH1749> it is melted<WH4549> in the midst<WH8432> of my bowels.<WH4578>
My strength<WH3581> is dried up<WH3001> like a potsherd;<WH2789> and my tongue<WH3956> cleaveth<WH1692> to my jaws;<WH4455> and thou hast brought<WH8239> me into the dust<WH6083> of death.<WH4194>
For <WH3588> dogs<WH3611> have compassed<WH5437> me: the assembly<WH5712> of the wicked<WH7489> have enclosed<WH5362> me: they pierced<WH738> my hands<WH3027> and my feet.<WH7272>
I may tell<WH5608> all<WH3605> my bones:<WH6106> they<WH1992> look<WH5027> and stare<WH7200> upon me.
They part<WH2505> my garments<WH899> among them, and cast<WH5307> lots<WH1486> upon<WH5921> my vesture.<WH3830>
But be not<WH408> thou<WH859> far<WH7368> from me, O LORD:<WH3068> O my strength,<WH360> haste<WH2363> thee to help<WH5833> me.
Deliver <WH5337> my soul<WH5315> from the sword;<WH4480> <WH2719> my darling<WH3173> from the power<WH4480> <WH3027> of the dog.<WH3611>
Save <WH3467> me from the lion's<WH738> mouth:<WH4480> <WH6310> for thou hast heard<WH6030> me from the horns<WH4480> <WH7161> of the unicorns.<WH7214>
I will declare<WH5608> thy name<WH8034> unto my brethren:<WH251> in the midst<WH8432> of the congregation<WH6951> will I praise<WH1984> thee.

Ye that fear<WH3373> the LORD,<WH3068> praise<WH1984> him; all<WH3605> ye the seed<WH2233> of Jacob,<WH3290> glorify<WH3513> him; and fear<WH1481> <WH4480> him, all<WH3605> ye the seed<WH2233> of Israel.<WH3478>

For <WH3588> he hath not<WH3808> despised<WH959> nor<WH3808> abhorred<WH8262> the affliction<WH6039> of the afflicted;<WH6041> neither<WH3808> hath he hid<WH5641> his face<WH6440> from<WH4480> him; but when he cried<WH7768> unto<WH413> him, he heard.<WH8085>
My praise<WH8416> shall be of<WH4480> <WH854> thee in the great<WH7227> congregation:<WH6951> I will pay<WH7999> my vows<WH5088> before<WH5048> them that fear<WH3373> him.
The meek<WH6035> shall eat<WH398> and be satisfied:<WH7646> they shall praise<WH1984> the LORD<WH3068> that seek<WH1875> him: your heart<WH3824> shall live<WH2421> forever.<WH5703>

All <WH3605> the ends<WH657> of the world<WH776> shall remember<WH2142> and turn<WH7725> unto<WH413> the LORD:<WH3068> and all<WH3605> the kindreds<WH4940> of the nations<WH1471> shall worship<WH7812> before<WH6440> thee.
For <WH3588> the kingdom<WH4410> is the LORD's:<WH3068> and he is the governor<WH4910> among the nations.<WH1471>

All <WH3605> they that be fat<WH1879> upon earth<WH776> shall eat<WH398> and worship:<WH7812> all<WH3605> they that go down<WH3381> to the dust<WH6083> shall bow<WH3766> before<WH6440> him: and none<WH3808> can keep alive<WH2421> his own soul.<WH5315>
A seed<WH2233> shall serve<WH5647> him; it shall be accounted<WH5608> to the Lord<WH136> for a generation.<WH1755>
They shall come,<WH935> and shall declare<WH5046> his righteousness<WH6666> unto a people<WH5971> that shall be born,<WH3205> that<WH3588> he hath done<WH6213> this.
